about_the_game:
The Heroine Anthem Zero Episode 1 Artbook feature all of the stunning visuals of the 2D RPG classic, available in English for the first time on the Steam platform. The artbook is available for a special discount price to show our appreciation for the support of our fans.

In addition to the art shown in-game, the artbook encompasses all available materials from the making of Heroine Anthem Zero: including concept art, level design, character roughs, special illustrations and detailed introductions to all the characters and locations. 302 pages long, this artbook is the essential companion guide and art resource to the myths, legends and reality of Heroine Anthem Zero.
 
The artbook features:

【World and Mythology】

　The background history, and compilations of mythology and legends in the Heroine Anthem Zero universe.

【Character Design】

　Character rough sketches and design, including monster design.

【Background art, Visual CG and Storyboard】

　Including background art, visual art from in-game scenes, drafts and storyboard art.

【Level Design】

　Detailed level art, and design drafts of in-game levels.

【Illustrations】

　All illustrations, including special events and other material.
